H0.text: Which long-running British TV series, now disappeared from our screens, began as a 1983 one-off drama called Woodentop'. Hill Street Blues

H1.text: Which long-running British TV series, now disappeared from our screens, began as a 1983 one-off drama called Woodentop'. The Bill

H2.text: Which long-running British TV series, now disappeared from our screens, began as a 1983 one-off drama called Woodentop'. Prime Suspect

H3.text: Which long-running British TV series, now disappeared from our screens, began as a 1983 one-off drama called Woodentop'. Mbarnes

A4.text: The Bill was originally conceived in 1983 as a one-off drama titled Old Bill, later retitled Woodentop.

A5.text: The Bill ran from 16 October 1984 until 31 August 2010, making it a long-running series that has since disappeared from screens.
